name: Nostalgia
description: A wistful desire to return in thought or in fact to a former time in one's life.

name: Repentance
description: Repentance is the activity of reviewing one's actions and feeling contrition or regret for past wrongs.

name: Sadness
description: Sadness is an emotional pain of disadvantage, loss, despair, grief, helplessness, disappointment and sorrow.

name: Ocean
description: The ocean is the beginning of life on Earth, and symbolizes formlessness, the unfathomable, and chaos.

name: Smiling
description: A smile expresses pleasure, sociability, happiness, joy or amusement.

name: Surprise
description: Surprise can have any valence; that is, it can be neutral/moderate, pleasant, unpleasant, positive, or negative.

name: Captivity
description: The state or period of being held, imprisoned, enslaved, or confined.

name: Flourishing
description: Developing rapidly and successfully; thriving.

name: Freedom
description: Freedom, generally, is having the ability to act or change without restraint.

name: Garden
description: A garden is a planned space, usually outdoors, set aside for the display, cultivation, or enjoyment of plants and other forms of nature.

name: Midnight
description: Midnight is the transition time between days, sometimes known as the Witching Hour, the time of night associated with supernatural events.

name: Tattoo
description: A tattoo is a permanent kind of body art present in many cultures.

name: Galaxy
description: A galaxy is a gravitationally bound system of stars, stellar remnants, interstellar gas, dust, and dark matter.

name: Allure
description: The quality of being powerfully and mysteriously attractive or fascinating.

name: Pride
description: Pride is an emotional state attaining positive affect from the value of a person or thing with which one has an intimate connection.

name: Adventure
description: An adventure is an exciting experience that is typically bold, sometimes risky, undertaking.

name: Remarkable
description: worthy of attention; striking.

name: Power
description: the capacity or ability to direct or influence the behaviour of others or the course of events.

name: Revolution
description: A radical and pervasive change in society and the social structure, especially one made suddenly.

name: Destiny
description: Events that will necessarily happen to a particular person or thing in the future.

name: Shadows
description: Used in reference to proximity, ominous oppressiveness, or sadness and gloom.

name: Myth
description: A traditional, legendary tale, concerning some being or hero or event, with or without a determinable basis of fact.

name: Tarot
description: Playing cards, traditionally a pack of 78 with five suits, used for fortune-telling and in certain games.

name: Skull
description: A bone framework enclosing the brain of a vertebrate.

name: Decay
description: The state or process of rotting or decomposition.

name: Mushrooms
description: a fungal growth that typically takes the form of a domed cap on a stalk, with gills on the underside of the cap.

name: Warrior
description: A brave or experienced soldier or fighter, especially within the context of a tribal or clan-based warrior culture

name: Treasure
description: To take great care of something because you love it or consider it very valuable.

name: Masculinity
description: Masculinity is a set of attributes, behaviors, and roles traditionally associated with boys and men.

name: Femininity
description: Femininity is a set of attributes, behaviors, and roles traditionally associated with women and girls.
